STATEMENT.name: RP_GET_TESTCASES
STATEMENT.query: Select Dra.Prgrichiestaaz,Da.Prgalternativa from do_richiesta_az dra join do_alternativa da on dra.prgrichiestaaz = da.prgrichiestaaz join an_unita_azienda aua on (dra.prgazienda = aua.prgazienda and dra.prgunita = aua.prgunita) Join De_Attivita Mn On Aua.Codateco = Mn.Codateco join do_contratto doc on (doc.prgrichiestaaz = da.prgrichiestaaz and doc.prgalternativa = da.prgalternativa) join do_mansione dm on (da.prgrichiestaaz = dm.prgrichiestaaz and da.prgalternativa = dm.prgalternativa) join de_mansione De On Dm.Codmansione = De.Codmansione Join Do_Comune Dcom On Dra.Prgrichiestaaz = Dcom.Prgrichiestaaz where dra.prgrichiestaaz >= ? and dra.prgrichiestaaz <= ? and dra.datpubblicazione is not null and mn.codatecodot is not null and doc.codcontratto is not null and de.codmansionedot is not null and dm.flginviocl = 'S' and dcom.flginviocl is not null Order By Dra.Prgrichiestaaz,Da.Prgalternativa

STATEMENT.name: RP_GET_TESTCASES_2
STATEMENT.query: select dra.prgrichiestaaz,da.prgalternativa from do_richiesta_az dra join do_alternativa da on dra.prgrichiestaaz = da.prgrichiestaaz where dra.prgrichiestaaz >= ? and dra.prgrichiestaaz <= ? order by dra.prgrichiestaaz,da.prgalternativa

STATEMENT.name: RP_SELECT_RANDOM_ORARIO_TEST_CASE
STATEMENT.query: Select Prgrichiestaaz,Prgalternativa FROM ( Select Dra.Prgrichiestaaz,Da.Prgalternativa from do_richiesta_az dra join do_alternativa da on dra.prgrichiestaaz = da.prgrichiestaaz join an_unita_azienda aua on (dra.prgazienda = aua.prgazienda and dra.prgunita = aua.prgunita) Join De_Attivita Mn On Aua.Codateco = Mn.Codateco join do_contratto doc on (doc.prgrichiestaaz = da.prgrichiestaaz and doc.prgalternativa = da.prgalternativa) join do_mansione dm on (da.prgrichiestaaz = dm.prgrichiestaaz and da.prgalternativa = dm.prgalternativa) join de_mansione De On Dm.Codmansione = De.Codmansione Join Do_Comune Dcom On Dra.Prgrichiestaaz = Dcom.Prgrichiestaaz where dra.datpubblicazione is not null and mn.codatecodot is not null and doc.codcontratto is not null and de.codmansionedot is not null and dm.flginviocl = 'S' And Dcom.Flginviocl Is Not Null and dra.prgrichiestaaz in (Select distinct Do.Prgrichiestaaz From Do_Orario Do Join De_Orario Deor on do.codorario = deor.codorario Where Deor.Codmonoorario = 'P' And Not exists ( Select Do2.Prgorario From Do_Orario Do2 Join De_Orario Deor2 on do2.codorario = deor2.codorario Where Do.Prgrichiestaaz = Do2.Prgrichiestaaz And Do.Prgorario != Do2.Prgorario And Deor2.Codmonoorario = 'T' )) Order By Dbms_Random.Value) where rownum = 1

STATEMENT.name: RP_SELECT_RANDOM_GRADO_LINGUA
STATEMENT.query: Select Cdngrado, codice From ( Select L.Cdngrado as cdngrado, ma.cod_conoscenza as codice From De_Grado_Lin L join Ma_GRADO_CONSC_LIN ma on l.cdngrado = ma.cdngrado Where Sysdate Between l.Datinizioval And l.Datfineval Order By Dbms_Random.Value ) WHERE rownum = 1

STATEMENT.name: RP_SELECT_RANDOM_COD_LINGUA
STATEMENT.query: Select Codlingua From (Select Codlingua From De_Lingua Where Sysdate Between Datinizioval And Datfineval and codlingua not in (select codlingua from do_lingua where prgrichiestaaz = ? and prgalternativa = ?) Order By Dbms_Random.Value ) Where Rownum = 1

STATEMENT.name: RP_SELECT_RANDOM_COD_LINGUA_NOT_VALID
STATEMENT.query: Select Codlingua From (Select Codlingua From De_Lingua Where Sysdate not Between Datinizioval And Datfineval and codlingua not in (select codlingua from do_lingua where prgrichiestaaz = ? and prgalternativa = ?) Order By Dbms_Random.Value ) Where Rownum = 1

STATEMENT.name: RP_SELECT_RANDOM_PRGAZIENDA_PRGUNITA
STATEMENT.query: Select Prgazienda,Prgunita From (Select Aua.Prgazienda, Aua.Prgunita From An_Unita_Azienda aua Join De_Attivita Mn On Aua.Codateco = Mn.Codateco where mn.codatecodot is not null Order By Dbms_Random.Value ) Where Rownum = 1

STATEMENT.name: RP_GET_CPI
STATEMENT.query: select de_cpi.codcpi as codcpi From De_Cpi Join De_Provincia On (De_Cpi.Codcpi = De_Provincia.Codcpicapoluogo) join ts_generale on (de_provincia.codprovincia = ts_generale.CODPROVINCIASIL)
